content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2, -54)
Consists of steam engine(position (2, -54)), boiler(position (1, -56)) and offshore pump (position (1, -58))

### Copper plate mine at position(4, -60)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (4, -60)

### Iron chest at position(4.5, -58.5)
Consists of an iron chest at position (4.5, -58.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available in the inventory before attempting to craft an item. Specifically, the agent is repeatedly failing to craft `iron-chest` because it does not have enough `iron-plate`. Make sure to smelt enough `iron-plate` before crafting `iron-chest`.

## NAMESPACE

### Variables
- None
